getCategories

public DataLoader getCategories(java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                                java.lang.Boolean includeProducts,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantIds,
                                DataLoadListener listener)
Description copied from interface: CatalogDAO
Get all the categories for the provided merchant type including products if "includeProducts" is set to true

Specified by:
getCategories in interface CatalogDAO
Parameters:
merchantTypeIds - list of id for Merchant types to filter categories.
includeProducts - Boolean indicating if the products should also be added in the categories
merchantIds - list of id for Merchant to filter categories.
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getCities

public DataLoader getCities(double latitude,
                            double longitude,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                            java.lang.String searchTerm,
                            DataLoadListener listener)
Description copied from interface: CatalogDAO
Load all the cities with some advance criteria like location merchnatType..

Specified by:
getCities in interface CatalogDAO
Parameters:
latitude - double with the location of merchant types to retrieve.
longitude - double with the location of merchant types to retrieve.
merchantTypeIds - id for kind of merchants we look for in the cities. Cities with no merchant in this types will not be returned.
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in city filtering.
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore
